children.subject: Have scholarship offers been sent out already? If not, when might we hear back?

history.content:
Dear Students,
This year the Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing will be virtual, and EECS will be sponsoring 40 registration scholarships for students in the EECS Department.  Students may apply for registration scholarships to attend the conference which will be held virtually September 27th - October 1st, 2021.

Please apply only if you are available to attend.  For information about the conference please visit the following link: https://ghc.anitab.org/
 
The deadline to submit for consideration is July 5th at 11:59pm PST.  Preference will be given to first time attendees and those nearing the end of their academic programs.  

Please apply for the scholarship here.
Audrey Sillers
Director of Student Diversity
Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences
203 Cory Hall
Berkeley, CA 94720-1770
Pronouns: she/her/hers
